channel.title: 2 Questions.*EDIT,3 Q's*
channel.description:
I need help with my private server(it is not yet released to public,I am testing it.)I have 2 questions.The first one is: When I am on my server,every 30mins,it logs me out,then says error connecting to server,or some crap like that.I then have to close run.bat and re open.I think it might be an auto thingy,I don't know how to get rid of it.
The second one is: When I log out and log back in,I have 10/40 hitpoints.But before I logged out it was 40/40.Does anyone know how to fix this.By the way,my source is DemonScape,its pretty cool source.
PS:If this post breaks any rules,please lock it.If it is in the wrong section,please move it. ;)
Edit:I have another question.Whenever someone exits tut island,they get level 16attack,strength,and deffence,and 30something hp.Is there anything I can do about it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2008, 04:55:27 pm[/size][hr]Help,anyone?
